Question
========

An entrance exam has scores that are approximately normally distributed with a mean of 500 and a standard deviation of 100. If you select randomly select 40 scores, what is the distribution of the mean of this sample?

Answerlist
----------

* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 20 and standard error of 2.5.
* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 250 and standard error of 50.
* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 500 and standard error of 2.5.
* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 500 and standard error of 15.8.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 20 and standard error of 2.5: Incorrect
* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 250 and standard error of 50...: Incorrect
* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 500 and standard error of 2.5: Incorrect
* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 500 and standard error of 15.8: Correct
